name: Xaladia: Rise of the Space Pirates X2
storyline:
As an elite special forces soldier of the planetary exploration team, you have traveled to numerous planets for survey missions and colonization throughout the galaxy. However, suddenly an enemy appears to obstruct your mission.
The massive force, which covers the entire universe, turns out to be highly aggressive alien space pirates.

Headquarters issues an order to you, who is determined to fight to protect the planets: "While supporting planetary colonization, exterminate the enemy and return to Earth (base)."
In the year 21XX, the long struggle for cosmic supremacy between humanity and the space pirates begins.
summary: Upgrade your weapons, control armaments, and annihilate space pirates! Cover the screen with a barrage of support weapons such as missiles, lasers, barriers, and bots! Captivate players with non-scrolling single-screen combat, flashy support attacks with armaments, and beautiful 3D graphics.
